name: Virus Petya
description:
Virus Petya - a simulator of the system administrator. In this game you need to run from one computer to another, to remove from the computer a terrible virus "PETYA". But it's not easy, because with each attempt of the virus to infect the computer, the virus gets closer to the end of his successful work. If the virus comes to the scale of fullness 100%, then the computer is blocked virus "Petya"!
You have 10 computers. To win, you need to have at least one of them was not infected with a virus. The virus with your every attempt to remove, change the location of the button "Delete".


Features:
- Based on real events
- The opportunity to be a system administrator
- You will see how this virus infects computers in the game
